meanings.definition: Orthopsychiatrists: specialists in the field of mental health focused on promoting healthy development in children and adolescents.
meanings.sent1: The orthopsychiatrists at the clinic work tirelessly to ensure children grow up happy and well-adjusted.
meanings.sent2: Parents often seek advice from orthopsychiatrists when they have concerns about their child's behavior.
meanings.sent3: The orthopsychiatrists organized a fun event to teach kids about mental health in a playful way.
meanings.sent4: In the world of mental health, orthopsychiatrists are like gardeners nurturing young minds to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The image of orthopsychiatrists planting seeds of positivity in young minds is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Orthopsychiatrists: professionals who diagnose and treat mental health disorders in young people.
meanings.sent1: When a teenager struggles with mental health, orthopsychiatrists step in to provide support.
meanings.sent2: Orthopsychiatrists play a crucial role in identifying and addressing mental health issues in adolescents.
meanings.sent3: The orthopsychiatrists used magic tricks to explain mental health diagnoses to the young patients.
meanings.sent4: To the troubled youth, orthopsychiatrists are like knights fighting the dragons of mental illness.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of orthopsychiatrists in healing young minds shines brightly in their work.

meanings.definition: Orthopsychiatrists: individuals trained in both psychiatry and psychology, specializing in the mental well-being of children and teenagers.
meanings.sent1: Orthopsychiatrists have a unique blend of skills to address the complex needs of young individuals.
meanings.sent2: Families rely on orthopsychiatrists to provide comprehensive care for their children's mental health.
meanings.sent3: The orthopsychiatrists used storytelling to connect with the young patients on a deeper level.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of mental health, orthopsychiatrists are like bridges between psychiatry and psychology for the youth.
meanings.sent5: The impact of orthopsychiatrists on shaping the future mental health of children is profound.
